name: Sensible UI
overview:
Sensible UI is an interaction technology company that specializes in various true multi-touch solutions. By deeply understanding both of the HCI (Human-Computer-Interaction) and technology, Sensible UI can satisfy customers by providing advice, generating ideas and building prototypes that inspire and can lead to new innovative products and services based on advanced multi-touch technologies.

Mission Statement Our mission is to improve the interaction between human and electronic devices by enabling low-cost, high performance thin and flexible pen/multi-touch sensing solutions.

Awards Qualcomm QPrize 2010 Regional Finalist

Products and Services â€¢Multi-touch Development Kit: Sensible UI offers an easy to use multi-touch development platform for companies, researchers, and developers who want to develop his/her own multi-touch/tactile devices. â€¢Design Consulting Services: Sensible UI has developed multi-touch hardware solutions, associated firmware/software and provides NRE consulting services to work with customers in order to optimise these within a customer’s product or application.These chargeable NRE services enable rapid low risk prototyping and rapid production deployment by licencees. â€¢Licensing & Support: Sensible UI makes multi-touch systems, associated firmware/software and reference designs available to customers for their product/application through licensing.
